name: ApplePodcasts
0:
”Alexa, play Conan O’Brien Needs A Friend on Apple Podcasts”
”Alexa, play The Daily on Apple Podcasts”
”Alexa, resume Business Wars on Apple Podcasts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Apple Podcasts brings millions of shows to Alexa. All free.

Before you get started, be sure to link your account so you seamlessly pick up subscribed shows where you left off on Apple Podcasts on any of your other devices. Begin by asking Alexa for your favorite show.

Remember to set Apple Podcasts as your default podcast player so you don’t have to say “on Apple Podcasts” each time you ask Alexa to play something.

Some shows contain content suitable only for mature audiences.

Need help? Go to apple.co/AlexaPodcastsHelp for more information.
